page.title: 13LEISURE TIME -THE CHILDREN
page.content: The only organised activity for the children is a Youth Club (7-14yrs.) held in the Institute during winter for 2 hours a week. There is no playing field or play area. Some of the children are involved in activities held in Thirsk or surrounding villages,1 cub,2 brownies, 4 are members of a swimming club and 5 go to a dancing class. 5 of the girls have ponies but only one belongs to a Riding Club.Most of the children have bikes and go off with their friends. 8 of the children have computers at home and most of them watch T.V. every day.3 boys have electric train sets. A number of children follow their parents interests,2 go sailing,2 fishing,1 gliding and 1 farmer's daughter goes to Sheep Dog Trials most weekends in summer.
